mapper.select: SELECT CHE_RES_NO AS challengeNo, CHE_TITLE AS challengeTitle, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, THUMBNAIL AS thumbnail FROM CHELLAGE_RES ORDER BY CHE_RES_NO DESC

SELECT cb.CHELLANGE_NO, cb.MEMBER_NO, cr.CHE_RES_NO, cr.CHE_TITLE RES_CHE_TITLE, cb.CHE_TITLE, cb.CHE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(cb.CHE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHE_DATE, cb.COMMENT_COUNT, m.NICKNAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM CHELLAGE_BOARD cb JOIN CHELLAGE_RES cr on cr.CHE_RES_NO = cb.CHE_RES_NO JOIN MEMBER m on cb.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO JOIN TOTAL_ATTACHMENT T on t.CHELLANGE_NO = cb.CHELLANGE_NO WHERE cr.CHE_RES_NO = #{cno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHELLAGE_RES cr JOIN CHELLAGE_BOARD cb on cr.CHE_RES_NO = cb.CHE_RES_NO WHERE cr.che_res_no = #{cno}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHELLAGE_BOARD cb JOIN CHELLAGE_RES cr on cb.CHE_RES_NO = cr.CHE_RES_NO JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE cr.CHE_RES_NO = #{cno}
AND NICKNAME
AND cb.CHE_TITLE
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT cb.CHELLANGE_NO, cb.MEMBER_NO, cr.CHE_RES_NO, cr.CHE_TITLE RES_CHE_TITLE, cb.CHE_TITLE, cb.CHE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(cb.CHE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHE_DATE, cb.COMMENT_COUNT, m.NICKNAME FROM CHELLAGE_BOARD cb JOIN CHELLAGE_RES cr on cr.CHE_RES_NO = cb.CHE_RES_NO JOIN MEMBER m on cb.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE cr.CHE_RES_NO = #{cno}
AND m.NICKNAME
AND cb.CHE_TITLE
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT CHELLANGE_NO, MEMBER_NO, CHE_RES_NO, CHE_TITLE, CHE_CONTENT, CHE_DATE, COMMENT_COUNT, NICKNAME FROM CHELLAGE_BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE CHELLANGE_NO = #{cbno}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(n.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, NICKNAME FROM NOTICE n JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER m ON n.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_NO = 2) WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHELLAGE_BOARD( CHELLANGE_NO, MEMBER_NO, CHE_RES_NO, CHE_TITLE, CHE_DATE, CHE_CONTENT ) VALUES( SEQ_CBNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{challengeNo}, #{chaTitle}, SYSDATE, #{chaContent} )
INSERT INTO TOTAL_ATTACHMENT( FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, CHELLANGE_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_FILE_NO.nextval, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{file_path}, SEQ_CBNO.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT CHELLANGE_NO, MEMBER_NO, CHE_RES_NO, CHE_TITLE, CHE_CONTENT, CHE_DATE, COMMENT_COUNT FROM CHELLAGE_BOARD WHERE CHELLANGE_NO = #{cbno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHELLAGE_RES ( CHE_RES_NO, CHE_TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, THUMBNAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL, #{challengeTitle}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{thumbnail} )
